tags.name: terra-accordion
tags.description:
A collapsible content panel for showing and hiding content.
---


### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The default slot for accordion content.
- **summary** - The summary/header for the accordion (optional, overrides summary property)

attributes.name: summary
attributes.description: The summary/header for the accordion. Use the property for simple text, or the slot for custom content.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description: Whether the accordion is open or not. This property is reflected as an attribute and can be controlled programmatically or by user interaction.

tags.name: terra-alert
tags.description:
Alerts are used to display important messages inline or as toast notifications.
---


### **Events:**
 - **terra-show** - Emitted when the alert opens.
- **terra-after-show** - Emitted after the alert opens and all animations are complete.
- **terra-hide** - Emitted when the alert closes.
- **terra-after-hide** - Emitted after the alert closes and all animations are complete.

### **Methods:**
 - **show()** - Shows the alert.
- **hide()** - Hides the alert
- **toast()** - Displays the alert as a toast notification. This will move the alert out of its position in the DOM and, when
dismissed, it will be removed from the DOM completely. By storing a reference to the alert, you can reuse it by
calling this method again. The returned promise will resolve after the alert is hidden.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The alert's main content.

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The component's base wrapper.
- **icon** - The container that wraps the optional icon.
- **message** - The container that wraps the alert's main content.

attributes.name: open
attributes.description:
Indicates whether or not the alert is open. You can toggle this attribute to show and hide the alert, or you can
use the `show()` and `hide()` methods and this attribute will reflect the alert's open state.

attributes.name: closable
attributes.description: Enables a close button that allows the user to dismiss the alert.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The alert's theme variant.

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description:
The length of time, in milliseconds, the alert will show before closing itself. If the user interacts with
the alert before it closes (e.g. moves the mouse over it), the timer will restart. Defaults to `Infinity`, meaning
the alert will not close on its own.

attributes.name: countdown
attributes.description:
Enables a countdown that indicates the remaining time the alert will be displayed.
Typically used to indicate the remaining time before a whole app refresh.

tags.name: terra-browse-variables
tags.description:
Browse through the NASA CMR or Giovanni catalogs.
---

attributes.name: catalog
attributes.description:
Allows the user to switch the catalog between different providers
TODO: add support for CMR catalog and make it the default

tags.name: terra-button
tags.description:
Buttons represent actions that are available to the user.
---


### **Methods:**
 - **click()** - Simulates a click on the button.
- **focus(options: _FocusOptions_)** - Sets focus on the button.
- **blur()** - Removes focus from the button.
- **checkValidity()** - Checks for validity but does not show a validation message. Returns `true` when valid and `false` when invalid.
- **getForm(): _HTMLFormElement | null_** - Gets the associated form, if one exists.
- **reportValidity()** - Checks for validity and shows the browser's validation message if the control is invalid.
- **setCustomValidity(message: _string_)** - Sets a custom validation message. Pass an empty string to restore validity.

### **Slots:**
 - _default_ - The button's label.
- **prefix** - A presentational prefix icon or similar element.
- **suffix** - A presentational suffix icon or similar element.

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - The component's base wrapper.
- **prefix** - The container that wraps the prefix.
- **label** - The button's label.
- **suffix** - The container that wraps the suffix.
- **caret** - The button's caret icon, an `<sl-icon>` element.
- **spinner** - The spinner that shows when the button is in the loading state.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: The button's theme variant.

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The button's size.

attributes.name: caret
attributes.description: Draws the button with a caret. Used to indicate that the button triggers a dropdown menu or similar behavior.

attributes.name: shape
attributes.description: The button's shape. Used to control the radius edge shape when button is not in a terra-button-group.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disables the button.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Draws the button in a loading state.

attributes.name: outline
attributes.description: Draws an outlined button.

attributes.name: circle
attributes.description:
Draws a circular icon button. When this attribute is present, the button expects a single `<terra-icon>` in the
default slot.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
The type of button. Note that the default value is `button` instead of `submit`, which is opposite of how native
`<button>` elements behave. When the type is `submit`, the button will submit the surrounding form.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description:
The name of the button, submitted as a name/value pair with form data, but only when this button is the submitter.
This attribute is ignored when `href` is present.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
The value of the button, submitted as a pair with the button's name as part of the form data, but only when this
button is the submitter. This attribute is ignored when `href` is present.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: When set, the underlying button will be rendered as an `<a>` with this `href` instead of a `<button>`.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Tells the browser where to open the link. Only used when `href` is present.

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description:
When using `href`, this attribute will map to the underlying link's `rel` attribute. Unlike regular links, the
default is `noreferrer noopener` to prevent security exploits. However, if you're using `target` to point to a
specific tab/window, this will prevent that from working correctly. You can remove or change the default value by
setting the attribute to an empty string or a value of your choice, respectively.

attributes.name: download
attributes.description: Tells the browser to download the linked file as this filename. Only used when `href` is present.

attributes.name: form
attributes.description:
The "form owner" to associate the button with. If omitted, the closest containing form will be used instead. The
value of this attribute must be an id of a form in the same document or shadow root as the button.

attributes.name: formaction
attributes.description: Used to override the form owner's `action` attribute.

attributes.name: formenctype
attributes.description: Used to override the form owner's `enctype` attribute.

attributes.name: formmethod
attributes.description: Used to override the form owner's `method` attribute.

attributes.name: formnovalidate
attributes.description: Used to override the form owner's `novalidate` attribute.

attributes.name: formtarget
attributes.description: Used to override the form owner's `target` attribute.

attributes.name: for-dialog
attributes.description: Used to connect this button to a dqialog on the page. Clicking the button will toggle the dialog's visiblity

tags.name: terra-combobox

Fuzzy-search for combobox with list autocomplete.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--host-height** - The height of the host element. _(default: undefined)_
- **--help-height** - The height of the search help element. _(default: undefined)_
- **--label-height** - The height of the input's label element. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - A `search` element, the component's base.
- **combobox** - An `input` element used for searching.
- **button** - A `button` used for toggling the listbox's visibility.
- **listbox** - A `ul` that holds the clickable options.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label the combobox with this.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: name the combobox with this.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description:
Set a placeholder for the combobox with this.
Defaults to the label's value.

attributes.name: hide-help
attributes.description:
Hide the combobox's help text.
When hidden, not rendered at all.

attributes.name: hide-label
attributes.description:
Hide the combobox's label text.
When hidden, still presents to screen readers.

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: status of the content

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: content or data of the combobox. This could be of type string | GroupedListItem[] | ListItem[] | undefined

attributes.name: variable-entry-id
attributes.description: a variable entry ID (ex: GPM_3IMERGHH_06_precipitationCal)

attributes.name: collection
attributes.description:
a collection entry id (ex: GPM_3IMERGHH_06)
only required if you don't include a variableEntryId

attributes.name: variable
attributes.description:
a variable short name to plot (ex: precipitationCal)
only required if you don't include a variableEntryId

attributes.name: start-date
attributes.description: The start date for the time series plot. (ex: 2021-01-01)

attributes.name: end-date
attributes.description: The end date for the time series plot. (ex: 2021-01-01)

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The point location in "lat,lon" format.

attributes.name: bearer-token
attributes.description:
The token to be used for authentication with remote servers.
The component provides the header "Authorization: Bearer" (the request header and authentication scheme).
The property's value will be inserted after "Bearer" (the authentication scheme).

tags.name: terra-icon
tags.description:
Icons are symbols that can be used to represent various options within an application.
---


### **Events:**
 - **terra-load** - Emitted when the icon has loaded.
- **terra-error** - Emitted when the icon fails to load due to an error.

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **svg** - The internal SVG element.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the icon to draw. Available names depend on the icon library being used.

attributes.name: src
attributes.description:
An external URL of an SVG file. Be sure you trust the content you are including, as it will be executed as code and
can result in XSS attacks.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description:
An alternate description to use for assistive devices. If omitted, the icon will be considered presentational and
ignored by assistive devices.

attributes.name: library
attributes.description: The name of a registered custom icon library.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: The CSS color to assign to the SVG.

attributes.name: font-size
attributes.description: The CSS font-size to assign to the SVG.

attributes.name: variant

attributes.name: percent

attributes.name: indeterminate

tags.name: terra-variable-combobox
tags.description:
Fuzzy-search for dataset variables in combobox with list autocomplete.
---


### **Events:**
 - **terra-combobox-change** - Emitted when an option is selected.

### **Methods:**
 - **valueChanged(oldValue: _string_, newValue: _string_)** - This component's value is read by other components.
Internally, the variable metdata has slight differences that require adapting.

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--host-height** - The height of the host element. _(default: undefined)_
- **--help-height** - The height of the search help element. _(default: undefined)_
- **--label-height** - The height of the input's label element. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - A `search` element, the component's base.
- **combobox** - An `input` element used for searching.
- **button** - A `button` used for toggling the listbox's visibility.
- **listbox** - A `ul` that holds the clickable options.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label the combobox with this.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description:
Set a placeholder for the combobox with this.
Defaults to the label's value.

attributes.name: hide-help
attributes.description:
Hide the combobox's help text.
When hidden, not rendered at all.

attributes.name: hide-label
attributes.description:
Hide the combobox's label text.
When hidden, still presents to screen readers.

attributes.name: use-tags
attributes.description: Determines if the variable combobox uses tags or plain text to display the query.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description:
Represents the EntryID (<collection-name>_<variable-name>) of the selected variable.
Other components (like the time-series graphing component) will use this.

attributes.name: bearer-token
attributes.description:
The token to be used for authentication with remote servers.
The component provides the header "Authorization: Bearer" (the request header and authentication scheme).
The property's value will be inserted after "Bearer" (the authentication scheme).

tags.name: terra-variable-keyword-search
tags.description:
Fuzzy-search for dataset keywords in combobox with list autocomplete.
---


### **Events:**
 - **terra-variable-keyword-search-change** - Emitted when an option is selected.
- **terra-search** - Emitted when the component is triggering a search (like a form triggering submit).

### **CSS Properties:**
 - **--host-height** - The height of the host element. _(default: undefined)_
- **--label-height** - The height of the input's label element. _(default: undefined)_

### **CSS Parts:**
 - **base** - A `search` element, the component's base.
- **combobox** - An `input` element used for searching.
- **button** - A `button` used for toggling the listbox's visibility.
- **listbox** - A `ul` that holds the clickable options.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label the combobox with this.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description:
Set a placeholder for the combobox with this.
Defaults to the label's value.

attributes.name: hide-label
attributes.description:
Hide the combobox's label text.
When hidden, still presents to screen readers.

attributes.name: searchConfig
attributes.description: type can be `Boolean`, `String`, `Number`, `Object`, or `Array`
